basicSentencePlanItemItems.objectiveText: To complete hours in a pro-social manner.
basicSentencePlanItemItems.measureText:
Feedback from UPW supervisors.

Direct observation in interviews.
basicSentencePlanItemItems.whatWorkText:
Information on pro-social behaviour given on Pre-Placement Work Session.

Pro-social behaviour modelled to offender.
basicSentencePlanItemItems.timescalesText:
Pre-placement Work Session within 10 days of Order being made.

Review at 16 weeks and at end of the Requirement.

basicSentencePlanItemItems.measureText:
Completion of Skills for Life assessment.

Feedback from provider.
basicSentencePlanItemItems.whoWillDoWorkText:
Offender.

Offender Manager.

Partner Agency.

Education provider.
basicSentencePlanItemItems.timescalesText:
Assessment completed within 10 days of Order commencing.

Review at 16 weeks.

Provision can continue on voluntary basis after expiry of Order.

basicSentencePlanItemItems.objectiveText: To improve his/her level of employability.
basicSentencePlanItemItems.measureText:
Offender undertakes VSL opportunities.

Feedback from VSL Tutors.

Obtaining a qualification.
basicSentencePlanItemItems.whatWorkText:
Achieve VSL award.

Employment interview with partner agency.
basicSentencePlanItemItems.whoWillDoWorkText:
Offender.

VSL tutor.

Case Manager.

Partner agency.
basicSentencePlanItemItems.timescalesText: Review at 16 weeks and at end of the Requirement.

basicSentencePlanItemItems.objectiveText: To assess and reduce risk of reoffending and harm.
basicSentencePlanItemItems.measureText:
Reduction in number of convictions / no further convictions during currency of order.

Feedback from others / other agencies

Evidence of positive changes.
basicSentencePlanItemItems.whatWorkText: Ongoing assessment of changes in circumstances, thinking and behaviour and how this links to offending / harm.
basicSentencePlanItemItems.timescalesText: Review upon significant changes in circumstances / at 16 weeks / at Termination.

basicSentencePlanItemItems.objectiveText: To improve his/her problem solving skills.
basicSentencePlanItemItems.measureText:
Reduction in number of convictions / no further convictions during currency of Order.

Feedback from UPW Supervisors.
basicSentencePlanItemItems.timescalesText: Review at 16 weeks and at end of the Requirement.

basicSentencePlanItemItems.objectiveText: To make indirect reparation to the community for his/her offending.
basicSentencePlanItemItems.measureText:
UPW hours undertaken.

Feedback from UPW Supervisors.
basicSentencePlanItemItems.timescalesText:
Undertake a minimum of 6 hours per week.  Complete UPW hours within 12 months.

Review at 16 weeks and at end of the Requirement.
